name: The Ground Division
description:
You're too late. The attack has already wiped out every human on earth. Now its up to you and your team to rebuild civilization.

Explore and survive on an empty planet with your team. Build shelter, scavenge the city, climb mountains, the possibilities are endless. Do whatever you want in this post apocalyptic world while you try to rebuild civilization.

The Ground Division aims to give a realistic and enjoyable survival experience that can be shared with friends in the Co-op mode, or you can be the sole survivor of this attack if you choose. Combining photorealistic graphics, complex and immersive gameplay systems, and support for various VR platforms we can achieve the most realistic and immersive survival experience yet. While these systems are complex and immersive, we have made them as user friendly as possible so just about anyone can be fully immersed in The Ground Division without worry of complex systems and interfaces.

FEATURES


- Massive Open World
- Crafting System
- Online Co-op
- Vehicles (Land, Air, Sea)
- Biome Diversity Throughout Map
- Stunning Open World Environment
- Photorealistic Graphics
- Full VR Support
